meanings.definition: A figure skating jump with a takeoff from the back inside edge of one skate and a full rotation in the air.
meanings.sent1: During the competition, she executed a perfect lutz on the ice.
meanings.sent2: The skater practiced her lutz jump tirelessly to improve her routine.
meanings.sent3: The audience cheered as the skater landed her lutz flawlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her lutz was like a graceful bird soaring through the air.
meanings.sent5: The lutz jump requires skill, balance, and precision to master.

meanings.definition: To perform a lutz jump in figure skating.
meanings.sent1: She will lutz during her performance at the skating show.
meanings.sent2: He lutzed across the ice rink with elegance and poise.
meanings.sent3: The skater decided to lutz in the middle of the routine, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His lutz seemed to defy gravity as he spun effortlessly in the air.
meanings.sent5: Lutzing requires strength and focus to achieve the perfect rotation.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Lutz greeted us warmly at the family reunion.
meanings.sent2: The Lutz family has a long history in this town.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted to know more about the Lutz family.
meanings.sent4: The Lutz surname is well-known in the local community.
meanings.sent5: Lutz is a common last name in this region.
